document.full_text: japan may cap tokyo electric power's  liability to as little as $24 billion for damages stemming from its crippled nuclear plant, the yomiuri newspaper reported, citing a draft plan being considered by the plant operator and the government.
document.title: tepco's liability may be capped at $24-45 billion: report
lines_and_colors: japan may cap tokyo electric power's  liability to as little as $24 billion for damages stemming from its crippled nuclear plant, the yomiuri newspaper reported, citing a draft plan being considered by the plant operator and the government.
